title: Rottinculo
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Coffee shop/wine bar/tapas bar/ restaurant, with a homey atmosphere, offers some vegan choices; please inquire. Also has many vegetarian dishes, which could possibly be made vegan; again, please inquire. Gluten free available. Uses tofu and seitan. All fruits and veggies are organic, the jam and bread are made-in-house and no preservatives are added to any of the food. All products from Italy and uses local producers for the fresh goods. Wi-fi. Reservations are required, so as to experience the owner's culture and philosophy without the space being completely full.
